abstract: The TM506 is the first phone from T-Mobile that supports wireless 3G networks in some cities in the United States and overseas.
snippet: The TM506 is the first phone from T-Mobile that supports wireless 3G networks in some cities in the United States and overseas.
lead_paragraph: With manufacturers falling over themselves to announce new smartphones, it is refreshing to see a standard, old-school clamshell handset now and again. The TM506 fits that bill: instead of keyboards and other bells and whistles, this compact device has a simple numeric keypad and a basic user interface for ordinary phone functions.

headline.main: Simplicity in a Cellphone, for the Inner Minimalist
headline.print_headline: Simplicity in a Cellphone, For the Inner Minimalist
